head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths NEWMAN, RICHARD J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths NEWMAN, RICHARD J.

block.p: NEWMAN-Richard J., on March 13th, 2000. Beloved husband of Nancy. Loving father of Michael, Matthew and Julie. Devoted grandfather of Benjamin, Zachary, Jake, Alison, Andrew and Sophia. Memorial service at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave. at 81 St., Thursday, March 16th, 2:30 PM. Memorial contributions may be made to the Hospice of Westchester and Putnam, Mount Kisco, NY

NEWMAN-Richard J., on March 13th, 2000. Beloved husband of Nancy. Loving father of Michael, Matthew and Julie. Devoted grandfather of Benjamin, Zachary, Jake, Alison, Andrew and Sophia. Memorial service at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave. at 81 St., Thursday, March 16th, 2:30 PM. Memorial contributions may be made to the Hospice of Westchester and Putnam, Mount Kisco, NY
